title: Golden State Warriors Fans Rejoice Over Team's First Win In 40 Years
teaser: The Golden State Warriors defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers Tuesday night in the NBA Finals. It was the team's first championship in 40 years and Oakland, where the Warriors call home, was buzzing before and after the team clinched the title. Youth Radio's Denise Tejada was there and has this story.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
